description: when running 'tox -epy27 -- nova.virt.libvirt'  4 empty directories with UUID names are created in the top level nova directory.
title: virt unit tests leave empty UUID directory

commit 1a00329f81766f3371cbe53118ee474798218f9c
Author: Joe Gordon <email address hidden>
Date:   Tue Jun 25 15:33:54 2013 -0700

    Stop creating folders in virt unit tests
    
    Before nova.tests.virt.libvirt tests created 4 empty UUID named folders
    in the top level nova directory.  Tests should not leave artifacts like
    these around.
    
    Fix bug 1194676
    
    Change-Id: I941b23ecb94db2f4a0cc60eeb06766f960775ba1
